attributes.action: Not create a database storing all UK citizens emails, text messages and phone calls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is the kind of Big Brother civil infringement that Orwell predicted in "1984".  This has nothing to do with the the probing of terrorism and another step toward total authoritarian control of people by monitoring and making people comply by fear.   
Given the governments appalling record in safeguarding data, how can they be trusted to keep these details safe if this ridiculous plan goes through.  Have the government not noticed that over 2million people have left the UK in the last 10 years?  Bring this in, and I'd imagine a lot more will follow them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
